name: Totally Unbalanced (itch)
description:
TRAILER: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nhvQQoXAv4w

Totally Unbalanced is a platform game developed with Unreal Engine 4 addressed to hardcore and casual gamers. The goal of the game consists in completing levels in the minor time possible and trying to surpass scores from players all around the world to win real life prizes. The game is separated in chapters that contains at least 10 levels with various,different and fun puzzles. Select your favorite skin and jump in this new epic adventure!
